category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > Sub-1 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.ism5
short_description: ISM 5 Click is a compact add-on board designed for seamless integration into a wide range of applications requiring efficient communication in the Sub-GHz 868MHz frequency band. This board features the Si4461, a high-performance, low-current transceiver from Silicon Labs known for its robust operation in time division duplexing (TDD) mode, enabling alternating transmission and reception of data packets.
